verses.verse: Not to us, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, not to us, <S%H8034><s%> but to your name give <S%H5414><s%> glory, <S%H3519><s%> for your loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> and for your truth <S%H571><s%>'s sake.
Why should the nations <S%H1471><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "Where is their God, <S%H430><s%> now?"
But our God <S%H430><s%> is in the heavens. <S%H8064><s%> He does <S%H6213><s%> whatever he pleases. <S%H2654><s%>
Their idols <S%H6091><s%> are silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>'s hands. <S%H3027><s%>
They have mouths, <S%H6310><s%> but they don't <S%H1696><s%> speak. They have eyes, <S%H5869><s%> but they don't <S%H7200><s%> see.
They have ears, <S%H241><s%> but they don't <S%H8085><s%> hear. They have noses, <S%H639><s%> but they don't <S%H7306><s%> smell.

They have hands, <S%H3027><s%> but they don't <S%H4184><s%> feel. They have feet, <S%H7272><s%> but they don't <S%H1980><s%> walk, neither do they speak <S%H1897><s%> through their throat. <S%H1627><s%>
Those who make <S%H6213><s%> them will be like them; <S%H982><s%> yes, everyone who trusts in them.
Israel, <S%H3478><s%> trust <S%H982><s%> in Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> He is their help <S%H5828><s%> and their shield. <S%H4043><s%>
House <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> trust <S%H982><s%> in Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> He is their help <S%H5828><s%> and their shield. <S%H4043><s%>
You who fear <S%H3373><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> trust <S%H982><s%> in Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> He is their help <S%H5828><s%> and their shield. <S%H4043><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> remembers <S%H2142><s%> us. <S%H1288><s%> He will bless us. <S%H1288><s%> He will bless the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> He will bless <S%H1288><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron. <S%H175><s%>
He will bless <S%H1288><s%> those who fear <S%H3373><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> both small <S%H6996><s%> and great. <S%H1419><s%>
May Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> increase <S%H3254><s%> you more and more, <S%H1121><s%> you and your children.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> are you by Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth. <S%H776><s%>
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> are the heavens <S%H8064><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> but the earth <S%H776><s%> has he given <S%H5414><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>
The dead <S%H4191><s%> don't <S%H1984><s%> praise Yah, <S%H3050><s%> neither any who go down <S%H3381><s%> into silence; <S%H1745><s%>
But we will bless <S%H1288><s%> Yah, <S%H3050><s%> from this time forth and forevermore. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3050><s%>
